string.name: app_name
string.description: Name of the app discovery application

string.name: action_close
string.description: Text describing the close ActionBar action.

string.name: gathering_recommendations
string.description: In place of saying loading, indicates we are gathering personalized app recommendations

string.name: recommendations_failed
string.description: In place of saying loading, indicates we are gathering personalized app recommendations

resources.string: Unable to display recommendations at this time. Please check you connection or try again later

string.name: install_now
string.description: A button encouraging the user to install the application now

string.name: sponsored_subtitle
string.description: A button encouraging the user to install the application now

string.name: sponsored_label
string.description: A button encouraging the user to install the application now

string.name: recommendations
string.description: A heading for the recommended applications to download

string.name: subtitle
string.description: Describes the purpose of the application - to surface application recommendations

resources.string: Check out recommendations based on your interests, what\'s new, and current trends.

string.name: license_error
string.description: Indicates there was an error while retreiving the license governing the application

resources.string: Unable to display. Please check your connection.

string.name: about
string.description: A link to information about the app

string.name: sponsored
string.description: Indicates the applications are sponsored advertisements

string.name: ad_choices
string.description: Text that links to a page for users to modify ad targeting

string.name: retry_error_message
string.description: Message shown when no app recommendations can be loaded due to transient errors

resources.string: Unable to display recommendations right now. Please check your connection.

string.name: unsupported_error_message
string.description: Message shown when no ad request fails, and the error is not transient

resources.string: Sorry, Get Recommendations is no longer available. You can disable this app from your phone\'s applications manager.

string.name: try_again
string.description: Call to action to retry the the recommendations load.

string.name: about_title
string.description: Title for a dialog explaining about the app
